channel.title: How to install "installous" on your jailbroken iphone/touch
channel.description:
Installous is a program that allows you to download and install cracked applications for free. This relates to almost every good app/game. If you want it free you will most certainly find it in installous.
1. Launch cydia (to obtain Cydia please visit [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,454242.0.html]this thread[/url] ) 2. Go to manage 3. Click sources 4. Edit/Add source 5. Add this url [code]cydia.hackulo.us[/code] 6. A prompt will pop up, click "add anyway" 7. Now go to the search option in Cydia - Type in "installous" 8. Download and install, a CMD will appear. Let it load and install everything then once that's done you have installous.

item.title: How to install "installous" on your jailbroken iphone/touch
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

http://www.elxsy.com/2009/06/how-to-install-installous-cracked-apps-on-iphone-3-0-os/

It Still Works

Do You Lose Your Apps When You Jailbreak an iPhone?

Jailbreaking an iPhone, despite voiding your warranty, will not prevent you from continuing to use all the apps you've bought through the iTunes App Store. Rather, the process adds an alternative app store, Cydia, to your phone, which works alongside...


Jaxov.com

How to Install Installous to Get Free iPhone Apps?

Installous is a free app available via Cydia which allows you to search, download, browse and install cracked / jailbroken apps on your iPhone and iPod Touch. The following guide will explain you to install Installous on your iPhone and iPod Touch.


answers.yahoo.com

how to install installous on itouch 3.0?

when i try to intall installous on my itouch it has a note that says: the requested modifications cannot be applied due to required dependencies or conflicts that cannot be automatically found or fixed. then theres a thing that says: install ...


http://www.dotdoh.com/?p=548

People have to learn somewhere eh?

@mapu wrote:

Installous is a program that allows you to download and install cracked applications for free. This relates to almost every good app/game. If you want it free you will most certainly find it in installous.

  1. Launch cydia (to obtain Cydia please visit this thread )
  2. Go to manage
  3. Click sources
  4. Edit/Add source
  5. Add this url cydia.hackulo.us
  6. A prompt will pop up, click “add anyway”
  7. Now go to the search option in Cydia - Type in “installous”
  8. Download and install, a CMD will appear. Let it load and install everything then once that’s done you have installous.
